text: A remake of “Rebecca” could have been fertile terrain on which to explore issues of control, abuse, and the sheer terror of becoming a wife at all. The superficial new Netflix adaptation fails to plumb these possible depths. https://t.co/8Kr6gfcUyX

text: “Performance was an old concept made new in 2020,” @MJSchulman writes. “Stuck in our homes, month after punishing month, so many of us lived vicariously through the people on our screens.” https://t.co/wXjGo63vAe
